description:
Impeccable nutrients in optimal quantity, that's what matters!
You can't go wrong with PowerBar's L-carnitine!

  • Tasty
  • Refreshing
  • Includes fewer calories
  • Contains less sugar

Recommended use:

  • Enjoy after 60 minutes of activity
  • Drink 200-300 ml an hour before exercise
  • During sport, drink 150-200 ml every 15 minutes
  • Up to one bottle per day can be enjoyed

Shake well before use!

attributes.Use::: Before exercising,     While exercising,     After exercising
